A lot of twists and deaths. I feel like:
Three words description: Dissapointing. Dumbstrucking. Nonsensical. 
Too many ideas for one movie results in a catastrophial series of scenes wich take no adequate time to explain anything or let any emotions or scenes or actions sink in. Jokes fall flat because they feel out of place\, dramatic scenes are ridiculous because there is no prober build up\, the "characters" akt weird. Deus ex machina saves the protatonists all the time.

The plus: Good graphics. But which big film doesn't have these? And good soundtrack?? I don't remember anymore!

My recommendation: Drink one or two beers beforehand and watch the film as "so bad its good"\, preferably on DvD. 

Done with the disney star wars.
